title: The The Western Front Companion
description: Shipped from UK, please allow 10 to 21 business days for arrival. Fine, THE WESTERN FRONT COMPANION - The Complete Guide to How the Armies Fought for Four Devastating Years, 1914-1918. A find copy in teal-green cloth boards, gilt title on spine with a fine dust-jacket in a clear protective wrapper. *******VERY LARGE HEAVY BOOK WILL INCUR EXTRA POSTAGE CHARGES OUTSIDE OF THE UK******
author: Mark Adkin
